name: Build-Push-Deploy

on:
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - 'master'

jobs:
  build_deploy:
    name: Build and Deploy

    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Check Out Repo
        uses: actions/checkout@v2

      - name: Docker meta
        id: meta
        uses: docker/metadata-action@v3
        with:
          images: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USER }}/petbot

      - name: Login to Docker Hub
        uses: docker/login-action@v1.10.0
        with:
          username: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USER }}
          password: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_TOKEN }}

      - name: Set up Docker Buildx
        id: buildx
        uses: docker/setup-buildx-action@v1

      - name: Build and push
        id: docker_build
        uses: docker/build-push-action@v2
        with:
          context: ./
          file: ./Dockerfile
          push: true
          tags: ${{ steps.meta.outputs.tags }}
 
      - name: Image digest
        run: echo ${{ steps.meta.outputs.tags }}

      - name: Deploy to ab413.ru
        uses: appleboy/ssh-action@master
        with:
          host: ${{ secrets.SSH_HOST }}
          username: ${{ secrets.SSH_USERNAME }}
          key: ${{ secrets.SSH_KEY }}
          port: ${{ secrets.SSH_PORT }}
          script: |            
            echo $SHELL
            docker rm -f $(docker ps -aq) 
            docker rmi -f $(docker images -aq) 
            docker run -d --restart unless-stopped -v /var/log/bot:/app/logs ${{ steps.meta.outputs.tags }}
      - name: Get date
        run: |
          echo "date=$(date +%H:%M:%S\ %d.%m.%Y)" >> $GITHUB_ENV      
      - name: Send notif
        run: |
          curl -s -X POST https://api.telegram.org/bot${{ secrets.TELEGRAM_TOKEN }}/sendMessage \
                -d chat_id=${{ secrets.TELEGRAM_MY_CHATID }} \
                -d parse_mode=markdown \
                -d text='GitHub%0A%0A*Job*: `${{ github.workflow }}`%0A*Branch*: `${{ github.ref_name }}`%0A*Status*: `${{ job.status }}`%0A%0A${{ env.date }}' \
                > /dev/null
